sentences.english: Me, Forever will also belong to our story extension go down.
sentences.chinese: 涐，永逺亦將屬箊涐們旳故亊延續落去。

sentences.english: a: i'm calling to confirm our luncheon appointment.
sentences.chinese: 我打電話來，是想確定一下我們約好喫飯的亊。

sentences.english: any deviation from the contract will be unfavourable.
sentences.chinese: 任何違反合同之亊都是不利的。

sentences.english: Come, tell me your story, we are here for you !
sentences.chinese: 這是我們癿家，我在這裏聽你癿敀亊。

sentences.english: Tell me about your family, Simon. Are you from a big family?
sentences.chinese: 西蒙。給我講講你們家的亊。你來自一個大家庭嗎？

sentences.english: You would think this would have been taken care of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你也許會認爲這亊多年前就解決了。

sentences.english: Currently he is member of Chinese calligraphy artist association executive Richard personnel.
sentences.chinese: 現爲中國書法藝術家協會常務理亊。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
variant of 信[xin4] (originally meant as part of the second round of simplified Chinese characters)
to vomit (of dogs and cats)/to rail against/to talk nonsense
